mapper.sql: RA.f_id as RAid,RA.f_apply_no as RAapplyNo,RA.f_rev_apply_finance_id as RArevApplyFinanceId,RA.f_visible_type as RAvisibleType,RA.f_mini_role_type as RAminiRoleType,RA.f_mini_role_id as RAminiRoleId,RA.f_goal_type as RAgoalType,RA.f_channel as RAchannel,RA.f_apply_user_id as RAapplyUserId,date_format(RA.f_apply_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as RAapplyTime,date_format(RA.f_goal_start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as RAgoalStartTime,date_format(RA.f_goal_end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as RAgoalEndTime,RA.f_total_amount as RAtotalAmount,RA.f_tk_status as RAtkStatus,RA.f_opt_type as RAoptType,date_format(RA.f_tk_succ_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as RAtkSuccTime,RA.f_role_name as RAroleName,RA.f_b_phone as RAbPhone,RA.f_b_connect_name as RAbConnectName,RA.f_b_bank_no as RAbBankNo,RA.f_b_bank_name as RAbBankName,RA.f_account_name as RAaccountName,RA.f_bank_branch as RAbankBranch,RA.f_bank_province as RAbankProvince,RA.f_bank_city as RAbankCity,RA.f_amount_ptbt as RAamountPtbt,RA.f_amount_usr_real as RAamountUsrReal,RA.f_eas_bill_numbers as RAeasBillNumbers,date_format(RA.f_audit_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as RAauditTime,RA.f_audit_status as RAauditStatus,RA.f_apply_note as RAapplyNote,RA.f_handler_note as RAhandlerNote,RA.t_ebuy_supply_merchant_fk as RAtEbuySupplyMerchantFk,RA.f_revenue_type as RArevenueType,RA.f_revenue_rate as RArevenueRate,RA.f_eas_payed_amount as RAeasPayedAmount,RA.t_gb_id as RAtGbId,RA.t_property_management_f_id as RAtPropertyManagementFId

RA1.f_id as RA1id,RA1.f_apply_no as RA1applyNo,RA1.f_rev_apply_finance_id as RA1revApplyFinanceId,RA1.f_visible_type as RA1visibleType,RA1.f_mini_role_type as RA1miniRoleType,RA1.f_mini_role_id as RA1miniRoleId,RA1.f_goal_type as RA1goalType,RA1.f_channel as RA1channel,RA1.f_apply_user_id as RA1applyUserId,date_format(RA1.f_apply_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as RA1applyTime,date_format(RA1.f_goal_start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as RA1goalStartTime,date_format(RA1.f_goal_end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as RA1goalEndTime,RA1.f_total_amount as RA1totalAmount,RA1.f_tk_status as RA1tkStatus,RA1.f_opt_type as RA1optType,date_format(RA1.f_tk_succ_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as RA1tkSuccTime,RA1.f_role_name as RA1roleName,RA1.f_b_phone as RA1bPhone,RA1.f_b_connect_name as RA1bConnectName,RA1.f_b_bank_no as RA1bBankNo,RA1.f_b_bank_name as RA1bBankName,RA1.f_account_name as RA1accountName,RA1.f_bank_branch as RA1bankBranch,RA1.f_bank_province as RA1bankProvince,RA1.f_bank_city as RA1bankCity,RA1.f_amount_ptbt as RA1amountPtbt,RA1.f_amount_usr_real as RA1amountUsrReal,RA1.f_eas_bill_numbers as RA1easBillNumbers,date_format(RA1.f_audit_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as RA1auditTime,RA1.f_audit_status as RA1auditStatus,RA1.f_apply_note as RA1applyNote,RA1.f_handler_note as RA1handlerNote,RA1.t_ebuy_supply_merchant_fk as RA1tEbuySupplyMerchantFk,RA1.f_revenue_type as RA1revenueType,RA1.f_revenue_rate as RA1revenueRate,RA1.f_eas_payed_amount as RA1easPayedAmount,RA1.t_gb_id as RA1tGbId,RA1.t_property_management_f_id as RA1tPropertyManagementFId
